mapper.insert: insert into members(member_num, member_id, member_pw, member_name, member_addr, member_addr_detail, member_post , member_phone1, member_phone2, gender, member_birth, member_email, member_regist) values(#{memberNum}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberAddr}, #{memberAddrDetail}, #{memberPost} , #{memberPhone1}, #{memberPhone2}, #{gender}, #{memberBirth}, #{memberEmail}, sysdate)
